title: Main Features of E5330Bs-6
answer:
A:

The E5330Bs-6 mainly supports the following features:

l  HSPA+ (DL) data service of up to 21.6 Mbit/s

l  HSDPA (DL) data service of up to 14.4 Mbit/s

l  HSUPA (UL) data service of up to 5.76 Mbit/s

l  UMTS data service of up to 384 kbit/s

l  EDGE data service of up to 236.8 kbit/s

l  GPRS data service of up to 85.6 kbit/s

l  PS domain data service based on UMTS and GSM

l  SMS based on CS/PS domain of GSM and UMTS

l  Wi-Fi

l  Five-second fast boot

l  Support for HUAWEI Mobile WiFi App

l  Press and Play 

l  3G/Wi-Fi auto offload

l  IPv6 /IPv4 dual stack (optional)

l  Built-in DHCP Server, DNS RELAY and NAT

l  Online software upgrade

l  Traffic statistic

l  Standard Micro USB interface

l  HiLink features (Driverless, Zero installation)

l  LED indicators

l  Built-in UMTS and WLAN high gain antenna 

l  Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1/SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8 (does not support Windows RT), MAC OS X 10.6, 10.7 and 10.8 with latest upgrades
